resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleks. 

I love fish. 

The kind that is alive and swins around in a aquarim or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 

Fun fact is that i have several aquariums and a river. n
I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

0nce, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a Lange salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
InYou should ask someone else about fishing, though.
